Room.Name: Roland's Fighting Academy Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You have defeated the green knight and are worthy to advance.
Room.LongDescription: A vial of holy water has been left here for your use to mend some of the very bad wounds you might have suffered in battle. You are now worthy to train to the level of Punisher. When you are ready to advance again, come back to Roland's Fighting Academy and we will continue your training.
